meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel mild astonishment or shock.
meanings.sent1: The magician's trick will surprise the audience.
meanings.sent2: I will surprise my friend with a birthday gift.
meanings.sent3: It would surprise me if the cat started talking.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden appearance at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise outside the window surprised the sleeping dog.

meanings.definition: An unexpected or astonishing event, fact, or thing.
meanings.sent1: The birthday party was full of surprise for the guests.
meanings.sent2: Opening the gift box revealed a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent3: The surprise in the box made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Life is full of surprises, like finding a pearl in an oyster.
meanings.sent5: The surprise on her face was priceless when she saw the cake.
